attributes.additional_details: No more swapping papers, no more deceit, no more changing current slips to what they have been ordered to change it ..Its fraud and a crime
attributes.background: Only people who have lived here for more than 20 years have a right to vote and NOT OUTSIDE THE UK .This is because of the vote rigging and the ballots swapping papers for ' one they made earlier' slips..This is unfair and unjust .We the people of the UK demand change and a fair trial in the voting.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific steps you would like the Government or Parliament to take to reduce electoral fraud. 

If you believe you have evidence that electoral fraud has been committed, you can find out how to report it here:

http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/find-information-by-subject/electoral-fraud/preventing-and-reporting-electoral-fraud
